title: Gravedigger's Shovel
summaries: The Gravedigger's Shovel is a tool that can be used to dig up "soft" blocks (see below) more efficiently than a pickaxe or drill, in a 3Ã—3-tile rectangle centered on the cursor.
It takes 2 swings to dig up each "soft" block, and all blocks are mined at the same time.
Its best modifier is Legendary. However, due to rounding, Legendary, Light, Deadly, Agile, Quick, and Nasty provide equal boosts to mining speed for this tool.
